title: Vintage Font Help
content:
Any ideas would be greatly appreciated.

Kindly,  
joe

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063442im_/http:/typophile.com/files/freewheelin_3474.jpg)
author: billegoat

comments.content:
It's definitely beautiful. Similar to Streamline?

Thanks for the help.

Yes, it's hand lettered. Comes from [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063442/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/depressionpress/2862017522/). [Streamline](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063442/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/streamline_light/) is about as close as you'll get.
